des:
With alexa, you can control your lights, outlets, curtains, and all the Wit Life products.
First of all, you should download and install our app: Wit Life.
Second, you should buy at least one gateway device of ours.

Now let's see jobs rest:
1. Open Wit Life app, register and login Wit Life account.
2. When loading to main page, click the "+" icon on the right top and click "Add devices" in the menu popped.
3. Add all your lights, plugs, curtains and any Wit Life products including the Wit Life gateway.
4. When all devices are added, please click the new added Wit Life gateway and configure the WiFi info: SSID and password.

Now, all the job in Wit Life app is down, you can try to control all your device there for test and fun. And all the device should work perfectly.
Let's start setup your alexa and skills:
1. In your alexa app, click left-top menu icon and select "Skills" and search "Wit Life".
2. Enable "Wit Life" skill and this will lead you to the login page.
3. Input your Wit Life account and password and go next.
4. Select the network to be controlled by alexa and done.

That's all, you can control your devices with alexa now!
